mapper.html:
ADOIT Software Request

Dear {{37.`3`}},

Thanks for your interest in our software "ADOIT Report Generator for Word".

Please see below the link to the form to order a free trial license:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdH-Wmqd9EbMnC6kmecVFjWqobZH2jxf6eeVF0iBht3itre9g/viewform

If you have further questions, please do not hesitate to get in touch with our chatbot. Please refer to your client ID: {{37.`10`}}

Best regards,

Team Apples

Thanks and Regards,

Team Apples
mapper.subject: Software Request for Client ID: {{37.`10`}}
